metadata.title: CVE-2019-9904 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in lib\cdt\dttree.c in libcdt.a in graphviz 2.40.1. Stack consumption occurs because of recursive agclose calls in lib\cgraph\graph.c in libcgraph.a, related to agfstsubg in lib\cgraph\subg.c.

criterions.comment: graphviz package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
